Detailed Description

This class associates a key code with zero, one or several symbols.

A key code can have several symbols assiciated with different modifiers. The KeymapKey is loaded from a <key> element in the Keymap file. The keys are represented in the Keymap file as follow: 

 <key code="code" mod="modifier" locker="yes">
     list of symbols
 </key>
where code is the key code and modifier is an optional attribute that represents the modifier value of the key. The key is considered a locker key if the locker attribute is present. If the modifier value is not present, the key is considered a non modifier key and its modifier value is 0.
See also:
Keymap

KeymapKey::getModifier (  ) 

Returns the modifier value of this key.

Returns:

KeymapKey::getSymbol ( quint8  mod  ) 

Returns the Symbol associated with this key and the provided modifier.

Parameters:
mod Modifier applied to this key.
Returns:
